title: Phantom Planet
lyrics:
[Chorus]
Will you, take me
To the planet, you're from?
Will you, take me
To the planet, you're from?
[Verse 1]
There's nowhere there can be someone as sexy as you
(Girl you know I'm right about it)
Maybe you're saying things to keep me from you
(When you tell me that your friends are all sexy too)
There's something special about the look in your face
(Never have I seen a smile like yours before)
If you'rе not really into getting with me
(Thеn I got a question for you)
[Chorus]
Will you (Will you?), take me (Take me?)
To the planet (Oh baby), you're from? (Will you take me there?)
Will you (Oh), take me (Wanna go)
To the planet (Yeah), you're from?
(All women are beautiful where I come from)
[Verse 2]
You gotta be from something out of this world
('Cause they don't make 'em quite as bad as you on this planet baby)
Your eyes make me feel
(Like flying far away with you tonight)
Take me for a ride I wish that you will
(So look and tell me more about you)
Or maybe show me something else just as beautiful
(But you know that ain't happening)

[Chorus]
Will you, take me
To the planet, you're from?
Will you, take me
To the planet, you're from?
[Verse 3]
(Hey) Can't imagine being in a place where everybody as fine as you
(Trust me, beyond your wildest dreams)
Couldn't live without it baby there's no doubt about it
(Okay then, come with me)
[Chorus]
Will you, take me
To the planet, you're from?
Will you, take me
To the planet, you're from?
[Chorus]
Will you, take me
To the planet, you're from?
Will you, take me
To the planet, you're from?
(You're from, you're from, you're from)
